i guess what ppl are trying to tell you here is that its better not to hate eachother..we can never hope for a better peaceful future if we think that way..

So the enemy is not what they call "The other"..they enemy lives in all of us..the seed of hatred and who knows if it wasnt for some hateful ppl on eachside, these religions would live in harmony as they did few hundred years ago..

ohh i just realized ..you might scorn me next for making up the fact that even jews were killed during crusades..I didnt make that up..the crusades were barbaric and those armies raided any town that was along the way and killed innocent ppl including jews..
